info.name: Platea
info.description:
DESIGN BY:
Francesca Martelli/Daniela Puppa

MATERIALS:
Painted methacrylate lamp unit/reflector; opal methacrylate rear diffuser. The light is diffused both through the cut on the front surface of the lamp, and from the diffuser positioned at the rear.

INFORMATIONS:
FLUO 1X42W
